subject: Economy
question_en: What is Gross Domestic Product (GDP) at current market price (GP)?
question_hi: मूल्य मतीय आय (GDP) क्या आवश्यक मार्केटिक प्रतिविद्या की प्रश्न है।
explanation_en: The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) at current market price (GP) for a country is the total value of goods and services produced within the country's geographical boundary in a specific period (usually a year), calculated at current market prices.
explanation_hi: राज्य के भागों और सेवाओं के निर्माण कें का वर्ल्ड को विकों कें का वर्ल्ड को वर्ल्ड को वर्ल्ड को वर्ल्ड को वर्ल्ड को वर्ल्ड को वर्ल्ड को वर्ल्ड को वर्ल्ड को वर्लेड
explanation_en: The GDP (Gross Domestic Product) is the total value of goods and services produced within a country in a given year, while Railway Budget refers to the annual financial statement released by the Indian Railways detailing its income, expenditure, and proposals.
